about_the_game:
VOGO: Conquer the Galaxy with Your Mind

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate galactic overlord? VOGO (Venus One: Galactic Overlords) is a turn-based strategy game that will test your skills, logic, and creativity in spectacular space showdowns for interstellar control. You will travel across time and space, facing off against devious AI and ruthless players.

VOGO is a game of simple rules but endless possibilities. You and your opponent take turns placing your outposts on a grid, trying to surround more territory and destroy more structures than the other. But watch out, because every move can also be a trap, and one blunder can spell doom. You will need to use your brain, your intuition, and your imagination to outwit your opponent and claim victory.

VOGO is a game for everyone who loves strategy and sci-fi. Whether you are young or old, beginner or expert, you will have fun and learn new things in VOGO’s galaxy of strategic challenges. VOGO’s infinite complexity demands skill, strategy, and a touch of luck to come out on top. You can create your own style and express your personality through your moves. You can also challenge yourself with different modes and difficulties, from casual to hardcore.

VOGO is also a game of delightful graphics and immersive sound. From its sleek and futuristic design to the thrilling electronic soundtrack that will keep you pumped, VOGO is a feast for your eyes and ears as well as your mind.

How long can you play VOGO? As long as you want! Whether you play for 10 minutes or 10 hours at a time, you will always find something new and exciting in VOGO’s universe of strategic possibilities. Are you ready to enter the world of VOGO?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or similar
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or better with latest binary drivers
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Monterey or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal 1.2 compatible discrete graphics card
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Venus One: Galactic Overlords

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Outwit or perish in VOGO, a thrilling turn-based strategy game. In every move, you have a chance to surround more territory and destroy more structures than your opponent. But be careful, because every move can also be a trap. Outsmart your rival and claim victory in VOGO!
